title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect information about custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting
description: The bug report refers to a bug in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1, which states that a custom cookie name affects URL rewriting. However, the observed behavior and expected behavior sections are currently missing from the bug report.
OB: Observed behavior: The current bug report does not mention any specific observed behavior.
EB: Expected behavior: Based on the provided information, if the statement in ch.7.1.1 is correct, I would expect the Reload link to be 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F'.
SR: Steps to reproduce: It is not clear from the bug report how to reproduce the issue. Please provide the necessary steps to reproduce the problem.
